name: I think I bought a Roommate
name_original: I think I bought a Roommate
description:
I think I bought a Roommate 

Winda Clarke found an out-of-place stall at the Fleamarket one Sunday Afternoon, nothing too odd outside of the large mascot suit. Something that could have been a part of her collection turns out to be a lot more alive than a piece of fabric should be. 

Content warning: This game contains unsettling images, gore, strong language (pg13) and jumpscares.

Volume warning as well. Things might get loud because of Renpy itself. ;-; Please be careful and safe. 

The game itself also takes place in Barbados, so there will be some curses we use in here. Not much but yea! uwu. 

Features:

-Word count: 2891

-3 endings

-Original art 

-POC characters 

-20+ CGS and 26 unique character sprites (some with a few alts) 

-15 - 20 minutes of content

Resource doc:

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1lcvA3iGfeFoWR4OeNXpqY3qu6otqHYhuHp9uwXZRtc0/...

Howdy hey! Shiroki here. 

Thank you for playing my first ever visual novel. 

This was made for the spooktober visual novel jam 2022! I could not have done this without my friends, a team in the end that put this all together. Feedback is always welcome!

The Mates!:

They did the art for one of the endings!

Link to their work: (note they do NSFW so please click with caution) Media Tweets by (Commissions Open) VVitch🔞 (@MxSinster) / Twitter

They also did art for one of the endings. :3c  (You'll know where)

Link to their work: (note they do NSFW so please click with caution) Media Tweets by 𝕸𝖔𝖒𝖔🔞 (@AggravatedMomo) / Twitter

They helped with the dialect just too make sure everything is and feels right. 

Link to their work: https://twitter.com/its_kupa

And Me! I did everything else. Coding, writing, the main artwork

Link to my work:  LinkyBear Comms Open!! (0/3) (@LinkybearComics) / Twitter
